resources.string:
Pendulum accelerometer data Collection and Analysis.

 Transforms accelerometer file data to Excel spreadsheet 'Pendulum/copy.xls'. Edit template spreadsheet 'Pendulum/input.xls'; columns 1-8 will be over-written by data.

 	Analyze: Kingsoft Office 
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cn.wps.moffice_eng

 	Collect: Physics Toolbox Accelerometer
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chrystianvieyra.android.physicstoolboxaccelerometer
 _________________________________
